00025 template <class Argument, class Result, class Fulcrums, class Degree>
00026 class TSplineGridFunctionBase: public TFulcrumGridFunctionBase<Argument, Result, Fulcrums>
00027 {
00028 public:
00029        typedef TFulcrumGridFunctionBase<Argument, Result, Fulcrums> BaseClass;
00030 
00031        typedef Degree DerivativeDegreeType;
00032 
00033        // reimplemented (imath::TIMathFunction<Argument, Result>)
00034        virtual bool GetValueAt(const Argument& argument, Result& result) const;
00035        virtual Result GetValueAt(const Argument& argument) const;
00036 
00037 protected:
00055        void CumulateRecursiveValueAt(
00056                             const Argument& argument,
00057                             int dimension,
00058                             const typename BaseClass::FulcrumSizes& sizes,
00059                             typename BaseClass::FulcrumIndex& index,
00060                             DerivativeDegreeType& degree,
00061                             double cumulationFactor,
00062                             Result& result) const;
00063 
00064        // abstract methods
00068        virtual const typename BaseClass::ResultType& GetFulcrumDerivativeAtIndex(
00069                             const typename BaseClass::FulcrumIndex& index,
00070                             const DerivativeDegreeType& degree) const = 0;
00071 
00075        virtual bool IsDerivativeDegreeSupported(const DerivativeDegreeType& degree) const = 0;
00076 };

00081 // reimplemented (imath::TIMathFunction<Argument, Result>)
00082 
00083 template <class Argument, class Result, class Fulcrums, class Degree>
00084 bool TSplineGridFunctionBase<Argument, Result, Fulcrums, Degree>::GetValueAt(const Argument& argument, Result& result) const
00085 {
00086        result.Clear();
00087 
00088        if (BaseClass::EnsureCacheValid()){
00089               typename BaseClass::FulcrumIndex index = this->FindIndices(argument);
00090 
00091               typename BaseClass::FulcrumSizes gridSize = BaseClass::GetGridSize();
00092 
00093               if (index.IsInside(gridSize)){
00094                      int dimensionsCount = BaseClass::GetDimensionsCount();
00095                      Degree degree;
00096                      degree.SetDimensionsCount(dimensionsCount);
00097 
00098                      CumulateRecursiveValueAt(argument, dimensionsCount - 1, gridSize, index, degree, 1.0, result);
00099 
00100                      return true;
00101               }
00102        }
00103 
00104        return false;
00105 }
00106 
00107 
00108 template <class Argument, class Result, class Fulcrums, class Degree>
00109 Result TSplineGridFunctionBase<Argument, Result, Fulcrums, Degree>::GetValueAt(const Argument& argument) const
00110 {
00111        typename BaseClass::ResultType retVal;
00112 
00113        GetValueAt(argument, retVal);
00114 
00115        return retVal;
00116 }

00121 template <class Argument, class Result, class Fulcrums, class Degree>
00122 void TSplineGridFunctionBase<Argument, Result, Fulcrums, Degree>::CumulateRecursiveValueAt(
00123                      const Argument& argument,
00124                      int dimension,
00125                      const typename BaseClass::FulcrumSizes& sizes,
00126                      typename BaseClass::FulcrumIndex& index,
00127                      DerivativeDegreeType& derivativeDegree,
00128                      double cumulationFactor,
00129                      Result& result) const
00130 {
00131        Q_ASSERT(dimension < BaseClass::GetDimensionsCount());
00132        Q_ASSERT(sizes.GetDimensionsCount() == BaseClass::GetDimensionsCount());
00133        Q_ASSERT(index.GetDimensionsCount() == BaseClass::GetDimensionsCount());
00134 
00135        if (dimension < 0){
00136               result.ScaledCumulate(GetFulcrumDerivativeAtIndex(index, derivativeDegree), cumulationFactor);
00137 
00138               return;
00139        }
00140 
00141        int& indexElement = index[dimension];
00142 
00143        if (indexElement >= 0){
00144               if (indexElement < sizes[dimension] - 1){
00145                      double firstPosition = BaseClass::GetLayerPosition(dimension, indexElement);
00146                      double secondPosition = BaseClass::GetLayerPosition(dimension, indexElement + 1);
00147                      double layersDistance = secondPosition - firstPosition;
00148                      Q_ASSERT(layersDistance >= 0);
00149                      Q_ASSERT(argument[dimension] >= firstPosition);
00150                      Q_ASSERT(argument[dimension] <= secondPosition);
00151                      Q_ASSERT(derivativeDegree[dimension] == 0);
00152 
00153                      bool useDerivative = false;
00154                      if (derivativeDegree.IncreaseAt(dimension)){
00155                             useDerivative = IsDerivativeDegreeSupported(derivativeDegree);
00156                             derivativeDegree.DecreaseAt(dimension);
00157                      }
00158 
00159                      double alpha = (argument[dimension] - firstPosition) / layersDistance;
00160 
00161                      double firstValueFactor = useDerivative? CSplineSegmentFunction::GetValueKernelAt(alpha): (1 - alpha);   // use linear interpolation if no derivative is available
00162                      if (firstValueFactor > I_BIG_EPSILON){
00163                             CumulateRecursiveValueAt(
00164                                                  argument,
00165                                                  dimension - 1,
00166                                                  sizes,
00167                                                  index,
00168                                                  derivativeDegree,
00169                                                  cumulationFactor * firstValueFactor,
00170                                                  result);
00171                      }
00172 
00173                      double secondValueFactor = useDerivative? CSplineSegmentFunction::GetValueKernelAt(1.0 - alpha): alpha;  // use linear interpolation if no derivative is available
00174 
00175                      if (secondValueFactor > I_BIG_EPSILON){
00176                             ++indexElement;
00177                             CumulateRecursiveValueAt(
00178                                                  argument,
00179                                                  dimension - 1,
00180                                                  sizes,
00181                                                  index,
00182                                                  derivativeDegree,
00183                                                  cumulationFactor * secondValueFactor,
00184                                                  result);
00185                             --indexElement;
00186                      }
00187 
00188                      if (useDerivative){
00189                             derivativeDegree.IncreaseAt(dimension);
00190 
00191                             double firstDerivativeFactor = CSplineSegmentFunction::GetDerivativeKernelAt(alpha) * layersDistance;
00192                             if (firstDerivativeFactor > I_BIG_EPSILON){
00193                                    CumulateRecursiveValueAt(
00194                                                         argument,
00195                                                         dimension - 1,
00196                                                         sizes,
00197                                                         index,
00198                                                         derivativeDegree,
00199                                                         cumulationFactor * firstDerivativeFactor,
00200                                                         result);
00201                             }
00202 
00203                             ++indexElement;
00204 
00205                             double secondDerivativeFactor = -CSplineSegmentFunction::GetDerivativeKernelAt(1.0 - alpha) * layersDistance;
00206                             if (secondDerivativeFactor < -I_BIG_EPSILON){
00207                                    CumulateRecursiveValueAt(
00208                                                         argument,
00209                                                         dimension - 1,
00210                                                         sizes,
00211                                                         index,
00212                                                         derivativeDegree,
00213                                                         cumulationFactor * secondDerivativeFactor,
00214                                                         result);
00215                             }
00216 
00217                             --indexElement;
00218 
00219                             derivativeDegree.DecreaseAt(dimension);
00220                      }
00221               }
00222               else{
00223                      // element out of boundaries at this dimension
00224                      Q_ASSERT(indexElement == sizes[dimension] - 1);
00225 
00226                      CumulateRecursiveValueAt(
00227                                           argument,
00228                                           dimension - 1,
00229                                           sizes,
00230                                           index,
00231                                           derivativeDegree,
00232                                           cumulationFactor,
00233                                           result);
00234               }
00235        }
00236        else{
00237               // element out of boundaries at this dimension
00238               Q_ASSERT(indexElement == -1);
00239 
00240               ++indexElement;
00241               CumulateRecursiveValueAt(
00242                                    argument,
00243                                    dimension - 1,
00244                                    sizes,
00245                                    index,
00246                                    derivativeDegree,
00247                                    cumulationFactor,
00248                                    result);
00249               --indexElement;
00250        }
00251 }
